snippet.title: Tribes of Midgard – Season 3: Inferno Saga Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Tribes of Midgard today! 
www.tribesofmidgard.com/buy 
 
Season 3: Inferno Saga is now LIVE with an update to the two Game Modes!
Patch Notes: https://www.tribesofmidgard.com/2022/08/season-3-inferno-saga-patch-notes/

A Commander has been lying dormant within his volcano and is now determined to destroy all those who set foot in his fiery domain. Use your best new Weapons, Runes, and Armor to infiltrate his ranks and take on the hottest challenge to date!
 
Join in this FREE update with the revamped Survival Mode!
 
Take the fight to the enemy, explore at your own pace, build impressive structures, and level up to new heights at your own pace! Or, play the rogue-lite-inspired Surthrival gameplay of Saga Mode to defeat the 3 Ancients before Fimbulwinter, the Endless Winter, begins!
 
Gather your tribe in Tribes of Midgard, a 1-10 player co-op action survival RPG. This update will be available on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC via Steam and EGS. It will also be available for the first time on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch in North America on August 16! Regions outside of North America on Nintendo Switch will be able to join in September 1!
 
“Surthrive” the Viking way in Tribes of Midgard, a multiplayer, action-survival RPG of gigantic proportions. 
 
Follow Tribes of Midgard on social media! 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/tribesofmidgard 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tribesofmidgard 
Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/tribesofmidgard 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/tribesofmidgard 
Website: https://www.tribesofmidgard.com
